TopicTitle: Need a laythe capable craft that can carry a payload!

Articles.Content:
I need a rocket that can take a medium to large payload to laythe (one way no need for return, I'm only worried about the payload). I also need it to be as low on parts as possible, and to be stock.

If anyone could help it would be much appreciated!

I will answer questions anyone may have.

(trying to put a floating object of some sort on laythe)
Why not assemble it in orbit, send up the payload and then send up the transfer stage and dock them together?
